DOC.criteria: Male erectile dysfunction 3 year accord National Institutes Health ( NIH ) Consensus Statement ( inability attain and/or maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) Diabetes 3 year Following label Japanese package insert vardenafil 5/10 mg , except high dose Spinal cord injury History surgical prostatectomy ( exclude TURP ) Patients HbA1c > 12 % Visit 1 Use nitrate Use potent CYP3a4 inhibitor Severe liver disease Presence Peyronie 's Disease
